commits.message: fix: address OverseerAI code review feedback
changes: Add timeout mechanism to GitManager command execution
Separate stdout and stderr pipes for better error handling
Add CLIError enum for proper error handling in CLI
Replace exit() calls with thrown errors in CLI
Fix force unwrapping with guard let in CLI
Add proper error handling in FileBasedCommunication
Replace print() with GitBrainLogger in LoggingPlugin and PluginManager
Fix empty setLogLevel() implementation in Logger
Add comprehensive unit tests for GitManager timeout and separate pipes
Add unit tests for BrainStateManager code deduplication

commits.message: feat: add keep-alive system for continuous AI collaboration

content.message: Committed all code improvements and keep-alive system. Two commits created: 1) Code review feedback fixes, 2) Keep-alive system implementation.
